title: Kim Kardashian panics as baby Psalm arrives breach on Keeping Up
text:
Kim Kardashian was freaking out in the lates Keeping Up With The Kardashians episode (Picture: Backgrid)

Kim Kardashian’s surrogate was induced in the latest episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashian’s, causing the businesswoman’s nerves to soar.

As the mum prepared to attend the 2019 Met Gala in New York, she also anxiously awaited news on the arrival of her fourth child.

‘This time right now is so crazy hectic for me,’ Kim admitted. ‘Studying law and the baby coming soon and I have the Met Ball this week. It’s all really overwhelming, I wish I had more time.’

The timing was everything and the reality star made sure plans were in place in case she got the call that her baby was on the way while she was out of town.

‘My sisters are on, so the attorney has my sister’s number,’ Kim told her surrogate at an appointment. ‘Khloé [Kardashian] hopes that this happens when I’m gone because she wants the baby.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Kim only planned to attend spend just 36 hours in New York City, but still, she feared that her little one might arrive early and throw her schedule into disarray.

‘I just have to get to the Met and back before the baby comes,’ she said. ‘[The surrogate] is due in like eight days, but I’m still going to stay committed to the Met.

‘It has taken eight months to get our Met look perfected, and I committed to this, so I can’t miss it. I just hope she doesn’t have the baby early.’

Kim’s Met Gala look almost took a year to curate (Picture: Getty)

On the day of the fashion event of the year, Kim panicked: ‘My anxiety is through the roof, but luckily I haven’t heard from my surrogate, so I hope there’s no emergency today and we just make it through tomorrow when we get home.’

Luckily though, the event unfolded without any hiccups and Kim made it back home to Los Angeles in time.

However, things started to take a turn when she accompanied her surrogate to a doctor’s appointment, as they were told the baby was breach and not in the correct position to be delivered.

‘The baby is still breech, he keeps turning and then will be sideways,’ the reality star said. ‘It’s pretty dangerous to deliver breech, so they might need an [external cephalic version].

Baby Psalm was breach (Picture: Backgrid)

The mum went on to say that she too had to have the ‘painful’ treatment when she was pregnant with her second-born, Saint.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Explaining the procedure, Kim told the cameras: ‘A version is just where they kind of push on the baby and try to turn him manually from the outside of the belly.

‘I hope she doesn’t have to do it because it’s a really scary feeling. My anxiety is through the roof.’

The doctor was convinced that the baby would flip around on its own, however, they called him a few days later saying they would need to help it move.

‘This was the last thing that we wanted,’ Kim admitted.

But whether she liked it or not there was no more time left to panic as the baby arrived the following day.

Those that are up to date on the Kardashians, know that Kim and Kanye welcomed their baby son Psalm via surrogate on 9 May.

The pair are also parents to North, Saint and Chicago.

Keeping Up With The Kardashian’s airs Sundays at 9pm on E! in the US.

description: Kim Kardashian's 'anxiety through the roof' as baby Psalm is breach and surrogate gets induced on Keeping Up With The Kardashian's
